body: Another use case would be if you wanted to use a custom `syntax.Flag` (e.g. if you wanted to use POSIX syntax but allow `.` to match newlines). Since `regexp.Compile` does not allow you to specify a `syntax.Flag`, your only option would be to use `syntax.Compile`, but then you would end up with a `syntax.Regexp` and no way to build a `regexp.Regexp`.
